title: Virginia Norwood, pioneered Earth imagery as ‘mother of Landsat,’ dies at 96
description: A male colleague once quit rather than work under Ms. Norwood's leadership. When he asked to return, she turned him down.

title: Finding love in an AI place
description: As loneliness rates spike, more people are getting romantically and emotionally attached to artificial intelligence bots. Today, we report on what it’s like to fall in love with software (and what happens when it breaks your heart).

title: How a tiny company with few rules is making fake images mainstream
description: Midjourney, the year-old firm behind recent fake visuals of Trump and the pope, illustrates the lack of oversight accompanying spectacular strides in AI.

title: Twitter pushes hate speech, extremist content into ‘For You’ pages
description: Twitter’s recommendation algorithm pushes racist and hateful content into the "For You" timelines of users who follow extremist accounts.

title: Companies ax ‘ethical AI’ teams, just as the tech begins to take off
description: Google, Twitch and Microsoft are among the technology companies that are cutting their ethical AI teams. Will these cuts pay off?

title: They fell in love with AI bots. A software update broke their hearts.
description: Users say their intimate relationship with the Replika chatbot alleviated their loneliness. But after a software update, their lover seems like a stranger.

title: TikTok is addictive for many girls, especially those with depression
description: A new study of social media platforms deepens our picture of the struggles faced by teen girls.

title: Rand Paul blocks Josh Hawley’s bid to ban TikTok ban in GOP split
description: Paul blocked Hawley's effort to begin work on a measure that would prompt a nationwide ban on the Chinese-owned app, citing free-speech concerns.
